name: Text
desc: A run of text with a single style.

fields.name: textSpan
fields.desc: The text to display as a [InlineSpan].

fields.name: style
fields.desc: If non-null, the style to use for this text.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How the text should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: Used to select a font when the same Unicode character can be rendered differently, depending on the locale.

fields.name: softWrap
fields.desc: Whether the text should break at soft line breaks.

fields.name: overflow
fields.desc: How visual overflow should be handled.

fields.name: textScaleFactor
fields.desc: Deprecated. Will be removed in a future version of Flutter. Use [textScaler] instead.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: An optional maximum number of lines for the text to span, wrapping if necessary. If the text exceeds the given number of lines, it will be truncated according to [overflow].

fields.name: semanticsLabel
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.Text.semanticsLabel} An alternative semantics label for this text.

fields.name: semanticsIdentifier
fields.desc: A unique identifier for the semantics node for this widget.

fields.name: selectionColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the selection.

nodes.name: Text Alignment
desc: The following are: left, right, center, justify, start, end.

nodes.name: Wrapping and Overflow Effects
desc: When softWrap=false; overflow options are: clip, fade, ellipsis, visible.
